dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 4464 RH: Permanent CFC Look-Through Act of 2014
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Boustany (for himself, Mr. Kind, Mr. Reed, Mr. Schock, Ms. Jenkins, Mr. Tiberi, Mr. Pascrell, Mr. Larson of Connecticut, Mr. Young of Indiana, Mr. Matheson, and Mr. Crowley) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means
Additional sponsor: Ms. Linda T. Sánchez of California
Reported with an amendment, committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union, and ordered to be printed
action.action-instruction: Strike out all after the enacting clause and insert the part printed in italic

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent the look-through treatment of payments between related controlled foreign corporations.

section.header: Look-through treatment of payments between related controlled foreign corporations made permanent

subsection.text: Paragraph (6) of section 954(c) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking subparagraph (C).

The amendment made by this section shall apply to taxable years of foreign corporations beginning after December 31, 2013, and to taxable years of United States shareholders with or within which such taxable years of foreign corporations end.

section.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Permanent CFC Look-Through Act of 2014
.

section.header: Look-through treatment of payments between related controlled foreign corporations made permanent

subsection.text: Paragraph (6) of section 954(c) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking subparagraph (C).

The amendment made by this section shall apply to taxable years of foreign corporations beginning after December 31, 2013, and to taxable years of United States shareholders with or within which such taxable years of foreign corporations end.

endorsement.action-desc: Reported with an amendment, committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union, and ordered to be printed
